problem_text_cn: 如图,A,B,C,D,E,F是平面上的6个点,则∠A+∠B+∠C+∠D+∠E+∠F的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, A, B, C, D, E, F are N_0 points on the plane, then the degree of ∠A + ∠B + ∠C + ∠D + ∠E + ∠F is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:如图所示,连接AD,设DE,AF交于点O,则∠AOD=∠EOF,∴∠E+∠F=∠OAD+∠ODA,又∵四边形ABCD中,∠DAB+∠B+∠C+∠ADC=360°,∴∠OAB+∠B+∠C+∠CDE+∠ODA+∠OAD=360°,即∠OAB+∠B+∠C+∠CDE+∠E+∠F=360°,
raw_comment: 本题考查的是三角形内角和以及多边形内角和,熟知多边形内角和公式是解答此题的关键．
